tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recycling_efforts (
  recycling_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  community_name VARCHAR,
  recycling_date DATE,
  recycled_materials TEXT,
  impact_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE community_recycling_centers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_materials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    material_type VARCHAR(255),
    recycling_center_id INT REFERENCES community_recycling_centers(id)
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_statistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recycling_center_id INT REFERENCES community_recycling_centers(id),
    collected_material_id INT REFERENCES recycling_materials(id),
    quantity INT,
    collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_centers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_bins (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_id INT,
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount_collected INT
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_activities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bin_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_id INT,
  quantity_collected INT,
  impact_metric VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Recycling_Bins (
  bin_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT NOT NULL,
  material_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Recycling_Materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Recycling_Statistics (
  stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_id INT NOT NULL,
  material_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount_collected DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  event_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES Recycling_Companies(company_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Recycling_Materials(material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Recycling_Events(event_id)
);
